question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Civic Center Way Improvements, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs
evidence_answer: Civic Center Way Improvements, Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Marie Canyon Green Streets, Westward Beach Road Improvements Project, 2021 Annual Street Maintenance
extracted_search_list: Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs
searched_docs:
Capital Improvement Projects (Completed)

Civic Center Way Improvements

(cid:190) Updates: The contractor has completed the planting material maintenance
period as described within the project documents.

The improvements modified the existing concrete
channel underneath Civic Center Way by adding a 3’ concrete curb adjacent
to the existing flap gates.

(cid:190) Updates: The contractor has completed the storm drain improvements in the
Civic Center Way are.

and includes installing new raised medians and improvements.

proposed improvements also include the relocation of the existing bus stop

2021 Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Updates: This project included resurfacing Malibu Road, Broad Beach Road,
Latigo Canyon Road, Corral Canyon Road, Webb Way, Rambla Pacifico
Street and Vista Pacifica with a slurry seal treatment and adding speed
humps to Birdview Avenue.

The project will also include the installation of new raised
medians on PCH in the areas where the double yellow lines exist in the vicinity
of Zuma Beach, specifically where the yellow paddles are installed.

Council accepted this
project as complete at the September 13th City Council Meeting. Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure

New raised
medians are proposed east and west of PCH and Paradise Cove Road.
